title: OR/Scheduler Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: It was quite simple. You get an initial phone inviting you in for the interview. The key thing I would say is make sure you have a great number of references because that is key and they DO call them!
Interview Questions: Name a time that you had to work through a difficult work task? How did you resolve the issue? What was your take away?

title: Cloud Engineer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: The process was a bit confusing at some pointYou can use the AWS CLI to specify, modify, and view the user data for your instance. For information about viewing user data from your instance using instance metadata, see Retrieve instance user data. On Windows, you can use the AWS Tools for Windows PowerShell instead of using the AWS CLI. For more information, see User d
Interview Questions: What is an ec2 server?

title: PCT Patient Care Tech Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Albany Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: Had many easy  questions to anwer, I felt really comfortable. Ansd I will also send the invoice for your payment of this code is that they have a new car.
Interview Questions: Tell me alittle but about youdlef?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Jul 2022
Interview Descriptions: HR does everything after the manager calls you. Then HR has you come in for a physical/checks vaccines, etc. Then you get fingerprinted. Then you go through orientation with HR. Then you go to your unit for an additional extended orientation...
Interview Questions: Hours I needed to work.

title: Childlife Volunteer Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 12 months. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Mar 2022
Interview Descriptions: it was fun  and playing with the kids and telling them about my experience with cancer helped them alot also this one lady helped me through alot when i was going through having cancer when i was sixteen years old
Interview Questions: how was it going through cancer at a young age and do you love to play with kids?

title: Dietitian Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center in Mar 2021
Interview Descriptions: It was easy, I sent my resume and and was asked for an interview. They were very nice.  The interviewer was very friendly. I did not get the job but I would come and interview there again.
Interview Questions: Describe yourself in three words.

title: RN New Grad Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Albany Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: quick and easy - just asked about experience and mostly told me how they only hire medsurg for new grads. the interviewers were kind though and timely in their responses.
Interview Questions: what was a time you made a mistake

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Albany Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: The interview was over webcam which was nice. They asked simple questions and sent me an offer the next day. I accepted immediately. Overall, it was the best interview that I’ve had.
Interview Questions: What was a mistake that you’ve made

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (New York, NY) in Feb 2021
Interview Descriptions: I had a zoom interview with nurse managers from different units. They asked me the typical interview questions and then opened the floor for any questions I had. After the interview, I set up a date to go to the hospital to shadow a nurse for four hours.
Interview Questions: What are some ways you would deal with conflict?

title: Janitor Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Albany Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: Overall, a decent experience. Felt like I was listened to and was engaged throughout the entire process. I would recommend to anyone interested in a good position at a good hospital.
Interview Questions: Tbh i cant remember sorry.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center in Dec 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very straightforward and general. Basically questions- strengths/weaknesses, high pressure situation, how you’ve handled patient complaints. The nurse manager was friendly and inviting and I did not have many nerves at all
Interview Questions: How many sick days should RN’s take a year

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Aug 2020
Interview Descriptions: Quick, easy, they get back to you within a few days. In person meeting before COVID. They want to ensure you can handle highly stressful situations. Understaffing will always be a problem so as long as you have a good team it’s okay, but it can be utterly exhausting a third of the time.
Interview Questions: Where I see my future

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in May 2020
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview with HR you then had to shadow on the floor you want to work on followed by a  panel interview with the manager, the clinician and a peer.
Interview Questions: Very standard scripted questions read right from the paper

title: New Grad RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Nov 2019
Interview Descriptions: Applied online, got a call from the recruiter the next day, went to an Open House event a few days later and then was scheduled for an interview with one of the nursing managers the following week.
Interview Questions: Why did you choose nursing?

title: Patient Care Associate Interview
Application Type: The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Oct 2019
Interview Descriptions: It was a very simple interview and seemed like I had already been hired. They asked if I had questions and discussed scheduling. It takes a long time to get an interview and then around a month to start orientation. Orientation was 1 week and then 2 weeks of training on my floor
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Emergency Medical Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Sept 2019
Interview Descriptions: I was interviewed in person by the pediatric and main emergency departments. They asked questions, asked for preferences in terms of shifts and departments, and gave me a tour of the Emergency Departments
Interview Questions: Experiance as an EMT. Ability to work as a team and under pressure.

title: Urgent Care Physician Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very open and not very intimidating. It appeared as though they were open to learning more about you as a candidate rather than interrogating you.
Interview Questions: What were some procedures you performed during clinical rotations?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Jul 2019
Interview Descriptions:
In person with manager. Was giving a tour of the unit. Following interview was left alone with other staff RNs to ask any questions without manager present. 
Interview was formal but I felt low stress. Took about 30 minutes.
Interview Questions:
Why did you become a nurse?
One time you overcame/dealt with a struggle
Where will you be in 5 years?
What is your biggest weakness

What are your strengths

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Jun 2019
Interview Descriptions: Took about an hour in total. The staff was very nice and had lots of reasonable questions. I felt welcomed and wanted. I was shown around the entire unit after the interview and then told to expect a call back.
Interview Questions: Prior experience

title: Patient Care Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: It wasn’t that bad of an interview process.  They give you an initial interview with the manager, then you shadow a PCA.  If that all goes well, and if you ask questions, you should get an offer when you get back from shadowing.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself

title: Patient Care Assistant (PCA) Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Aug 2018
Interview Descriptions: You apply via the website after viewing their online search engine, you are then contacted via email and/or mobile to schedule an interview with the head of the dept. The interview process was smooth.
Interview Questions: They will ask questions such as what are your strengths and weaknesses, discuss a time that you had difficulty with a coworker and how you handled it, why you wish to work with our company, what interests you about this field etc.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Mar 2018
Interview Descriptions: I applied online. Received a response within a couple days. Interviewed with the nurse manager, nurse clinician and met with some of the floor staff. Toured the unit afterwards. I received an offer the next day
Interview Questions: Describe a difficult patient situation and how did you handle it

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Dec 2017
Interview Descriptions: Interview process was basicall the same as every other nursing position. What they fail to tell you is how understaffed they are and how terrible there benefit package is. Employees are not valued
Interview Questions:
Previous work experience wn
hat degrees you hold

title: Patient Care Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Nov 2017
Interview Descriptions:
Brief and friendly.  I was interviewed by the floor nurse manager. She only asked two questions then I shadowed a PCA for an hour. Afterwards I was told that she will back to me. 
They got back after two days and I was offered employment. But I had to wait a moth for the orientation and then the one week training.  Everyone was very friendly and helpful.
Interview Questions: Why are you interested in this position

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: Submitted online application and was contacted two weeks later for an interview. Interview consisted of behavioral and situational questions. The nurse manager was friendly and the overall experience was pleasant. References were checked then I received job offer.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 5 years?

title: Business Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center in May 2017
Interview Descriptions: It was the first round phone interview. Two interviewers from the team. The interview lasted for about 20 minutes. They first introduced the company and position, then asked me to provide my background.
Interview Questions: What do you expect to get from this internship?

title: Medical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center in Apr 2017
Interview Descriptions: The interview was short and too the point with them mainly explaining benefits related to the job and a few questions. A tour was also given which gave all the insight that was needed for what you will be working worth and who.
Interview Questions: describe your typical day

title: Asa Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Feb 2017
Interview Descriptions: It was quick and straight to the point. The interviewer described the work position and the task required from the applicant. The interview process right from the job training until the completion of the hiring process was clearly explained.
Interview Questions: What are your traits that could impact your contribution to the team?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Jan 2017
Interview Descriptions: It was more of a conversation about the questions that I had about the job. We talked a fair amount about the orientation process and if the nurse manager thought it was comprehensive enough as well as what they were improving on it. We talked about master scheduling and holidays. I also had a shadow experience with a nurse on the unit.  I asked her about the doctors/residents/NPs/PAs as well as other staff on the unit. I also asked her opinion of the orientation process and master scheduling.
Interview Questions: Why did you apply?

title: Licensed Practical Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Dec 2016
Interview Descriptions: Communication started with a phone call, then a few emails, then another phone call. The last call needed with setting an interview date and time. The day of the interview I was 15 early but still had to had wait for the nurse manager to arrive.
Interview Questions: What kind of clinical experience do you have?

title: Administrative Support Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (New York, NY) in Oct 2016
Interview Descriptions: It was great, they as a lot of questions pertaining to customer service being that we would be working in the emergency department and encountering a lot of different people from different back grounds.
Interview Questions: What makes you a great fit for this company?

title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Sept 2016
Interview Descriptions: Several with shallow and disinterested people. They are afraid to make a decision. Four score and seven years later and you still won't have a decision. The hiring managers are spineless. Be prepared to pushback on compensation because Scrooge has nothing in them when it comes to stinginess.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work at Albany Med?

title: Asa Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Aug 2016
Interview Descriptions: Called me to come in for a 30-minute interview. Very quick. Thye just wanted to make sure I can do customer service. They called my references a day later and they offered me the position 2 days later.
Interview Questions: How do you handle stress?

title: Reimbursement Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in May 2016
Interview Descriptions: It went well the manager Kim even came in  early to talk with me. It's not at the main campus which is find with me. Kim even had me take a coding assessment which was great.
Interview Questions: Kim asked me if I was to get the  position would I be committed to staying.

title: Patient Care Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY)
Interview Descriptions: I applied on the Albany Med job portal and was contacted by the nurse manager. The interview was a casual conversation about the role of the position, her expectations from all employees, and why I was interested in the position.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself and why you are interested in working at Albany Medical Center.

title: RN II Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY)
Interview Descriptions: Interview flow went pretty smooth. They will ask you about your previous experiences, cases handled, learning experiences, difficulties encountered, qualities and traits that would beat describe you as a worker. They will give you a brief background of the position you are applying and the number and types of cases they have.
Interview Questions: What kind of cases have you handled before?

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Sept 2015
Interview Descriptions: It was quite short and very causal. there were 5 people interviewing me including the head nurse, manager, two administrative assistants from two other departments and the one from the department I was applying too. They didn't really ask that many questions and they basically conversed among themselves instead of talking to me.
Interview Questions: How long would you be able to commit to this job?

title: Patient Care Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY)
Interview Descriptions: Called within a week of putting in my application. Everyone was very friendly and made me feel super comfortable! I got shadow in the ER for 3 hrs but liked it so much I stayed longer! They said they loved me and to wait for HR to get back to me... Waiting for HR is like sitting on needles right now & I have to wait about 2 weeks for orientation ..
Interview Questions: Past experiences in the field

title: Medical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Apr 2015
Interview Descriptions: process was well organized and quick from the start, follow up with the interview in timely manner, and easy to follow through, HR and other department work together along well, and directions were given clearly for the interview
Interview Questions: What was the routine at the previous workplace?

title: Summer Nurse Extern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Mar 2015
Interview Descriptions: I applied in March and found out within a couple weeks that I was offered a position. There was no formal interview. They had a couple questions on their application, but it was very straight forward.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work at Albany Med?

title: Postdoctoral Fellow Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Dec 2014
Interview Descriptions: we set up time to speak over a skype phone. I spoke directly to the principal investigator of the project. He provided the detail information about his current projects and lab personnel. I got job offer based on the cover letter, cv, recommendation letter and one time interview.
Interview Questions: Work skill, long term career aim, expected salary,availability.

title: Desktop Support Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY)
Interview Descriptions: Why do you want to work for this company? Tell me about yourself - your education, courses you've taken, activities? What if you can't help someone? Tell about experience at other jobs. Define customer service.
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Systems Administrator Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Oct 2014
Interview Descriptions: I recieved a phone call and completed a simple phone interview, going over questions about why I was applying for this position, what my background was, and other normal questions. Very simple and easy.
Interview Questions: What can you bring to this company?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Jul 2014
Interview Descriptions: pretty short and simple. straight to the point. Relaxing. Manager was very prepared and so was I. We talked about food and where i lived and how convienent it would be if there were ever a call in.
Interview Questions: what are your weakness?

title: Respiratory Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Mar 2014
Interview Descriptions: The hiring process was standard, involving an online application followed by a face to face interview and a tour. The tour of the facility involved touring some of the critical care units in the hospital as well as the equipment room and the office. The actual hiring process was done by phone call.
Interview Questions: Sell yourself, tell us why we should hire you over other candidates.

title: Assistant Director Quality Management Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: HR personnel are friendly. The process of getting resumes to managers is slow. The interview process is fast. I went through many levels of interviewing before offered a job.
Interview Questions: How would you interpret this data (displayed last quarter stats) and how would you change anything to alter how we got those results? What strategies would you use to improve the care?

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Jul 2013
Interview Descriptions: Positive tone, desirable need for good nurses, nurses that work well with other staff members with various titles with good interpersonal skills and communication a must. Not afraid to approach staff with needs for patients outcomes.
Interview Questions: What made you want to become a nurse for amc

title: Patient Care Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: Received a phone call a couple months after i applied,brief over the phone interview.Was asked to meet in the hospital for a face to face second interview.
Interview Questions: Do you prefer games like monopoly or puzzles?

title: Caregiver Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: Volunteer first, then. Interview.   Know your area and be enthusiastic
Interview Questions: Continuing education?

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Jul 2012
Interview Descriptions: Waited 1 year before getting a response and going through a lot of hospital politics. Finally, the interview took 2 hours, because we kept getting interrupted. It is the same general questions you.
Interview Questions: When can you start?

title: Patient Care Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in May 2012
Interview Descriptions: Applied online, heard back within 2 weeks. Quick interview with the manager. Received a job offer on site. Hiring process took about a month. The hospital only runs orientation for my position once or twice a month so I had to wait for that to happen.
Interview Questions: No difficult questions, very low stress interview.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Jan 2012
Interview Descriptions: I was interviewed by the manager of the unit, asked some questions regarding my previous experiences, cases handled, number of work experiences, then right away i already know if i was hired.
Interview Questions: Describe your previous experiences and cases handled

title: Administrative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center in May 2011
Interview Descriptions: Short Easy, one on one. Made you feel very comfortable only about an hour long, Question were you typical interview questions. Such as what are you best traits your worst traits what do you contribute the most for team work
Interview Questions: How do you resolve conflict

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Mar 2011
Interview Descriptions: Interview process was straight forward. Asked the standard questions and had tour around the unit. Human resources was professional in setting up the interview. The manager of the unit was welcoming and answered all of my questions. Overall, it was a pleasant experience. Human resources offered me the position within two weeks of the interview.
Interview Questions: What are your strengths?

title: Senior Systems Programmer Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 6 weeks. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center in Aug 2010
Interview Descriptions: I was mislead on responsibilities and duties for the job.  The benefit did not turn out to be as good as described.  The start day is only twice a month.  The orientation is geared toward clinical people not towards all employees.  If you decided to leave the exit time is high for mid level to executive level people.  The is not much work life balance as they are always wanting more.
Interview Questions: What is your bottom dollar to come here to work

title: Licensed Practical Nurse Interview
Application Type: The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Jun 2010
Interview Descriptions: Review of my resume. Interviewed by human services, as well as nurse manager of floor. Overall easy comfortable interview with professional people.
Interview Questions: What are your specilties and interests in the nursing field?

title: Project Management Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Mar 2010
Interview Descriptions: Everything was by the book but they will never communicate with you if you are not selected....never.  This has happened to me twice now.
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Patient Care Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Sept 2009
Interview Descriptions: Interviewer made me feel very comfortable
Interview Questions: Who would you say our customer is?

title: Research Scientist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Albany Medical Center (Albany, NY) in Jan 2008
Interview Descriptions: Very fair, very helpful.  No quarrel with immediate management.   Very accommodating.
Interview Questions: Why did you leave your old position?
